content: Great read, Benjamin. Initiation, yes! Rushing to do something before you have thought it through, not so much. I believe discourse is imperative in making the right kind of progress. Not to the extent that we exacerbate every possible outcome but instead that we are being thoughtful and deliberate. After all, isn’t that how expertise is developed? Thank you for pushing me in this piece. Truly. I’m usually the younger son and need to rein that in a bit and be more patient.
